custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: AIGODLIKE
custom_nodes.title: AIGODLIKE-ComfyUI-Studio
custom_nodes.description: Improve the interactive experience of using ComfyUI, such as making the loading of ComfyUI models more intuitive and making it easier to create model thumbnails

custom_nodes.author: Chan-0312
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-IPAnimate
custom_nodes.description: This is a project that generates videos frame by frame based on IPAdapter+ControlNet. Unlike [a/Steerable-motion](https://github.com/banodoco/Steerable-Motion), we do not rely on AnimateDiff. This decision is primarily due to the fact that the videos generated by AnimateDiff are often blurry. Through frame-by-frame control using IPAdapter+ControlNet, we can produce higher definition and more controllable videos.

custom_nodes.author: LyazS
custom_nodes.title: Anime Character Segmentation node for comfyui
custom_nodes.description: A Anime Character Segmentation node for comfyui, based on [this hf space](https://huggingface.co/spaces/skytnt/anime-remove-background).

custom_nodes.author: zhongpei
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI for InstructIR
custom_nodes.description: Enhancing Image Restoration. (ref:[a/InstructIR](https://github.com/mv-lab/InstructIR))

custom_nodes.author: nosiu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI InstantID Faceswapper
custom_nodes.description:
Implementation of [a/faceswap](https://github.com/nosiu/InstantID-faceswap/tree/main) based on [a/InstantID](https://github.com/InstantID/InstantID) for ComfyUI. Allows usage of [a/LCM Lora](https://huggingface.co/latent-consistency/lcm-lora-sdxl) which can produce good results in only a few generation steps.
NOTE:Works ONLY with SDXL checkpoints.

custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Image Crop and Resize by Mask, Image Uncrop, Image Shadow, Optical Flow (Dip), Warp Image with Flow, Image Threshold (Channels), Finetune Variable, Finetune Analyze, Finetune Analyze Batch, ... Misc ComfyUI nodes by Rick Love

custom_nodes.author: Acly
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Inpaint Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Experimental nodes for better inpainting with ComfyUI. Adds two nodes which allow using [a/Fooocus](https://github.com/Acly/comfyui-inpaint-nodes) inpaint model. It's a small and flexible patch which can be applied to any SDXL checkpoint and will transform it into an inpaint model. This model can then be used like other inpaint models, and provides the same benefits. [a/Read more](https://github.com/lllyasviel/Fooocus/discussions/414)

This exporter is a plugin for ComfyUI, which can export tasks for [a/LAizypainter](https://github.com/DimaChaichan/LAizypainter).
LAizypainter is a Photoshop plugin with which you can send tasks directly to a Stable Diffusion server. More information about a [a/Task](https://github.com/DimaChaichan/LAizypainter?tab=readme-ov-file#task)

custom_nodes.author: JaredTherriault

custom_nodes.description:
python and web UX improvements for ComfyUI.
[w/'DynamicPrompts.js' and 'EditAttention.js' from the core, along with 'ImageFeed.js' and 'favicon.js' from the custom scripts of pythongosssss, are not compatible. Therefore, manual deletion of these files is required to use this web extension.]

custom_nodes.author: foxtrot-roger

custom_nodes.description: A bunch of nodes that can be useful to manipulate primitive types (numbers, text, ...) Also some helpers to generate text and timestamps.

custom_nodes.author: LarryJane491
custom_nodes.title: Lora-Training-in-Comfy
custom_nodes.description: This custom node lets you train LoRA directly in ComfyUI! By default, it saves directly in your ComfyUI lora folder. That means you just have to refresh after training (...and select the LoRA) to test it!

custom_nodes.author: Taremin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt ExtraNetworks
custom_nodes.description: Instead of LoraLoader or HypernetworkLoader, it receives a prompt and loads and applies LoRA or HN based on the specifications within the prompt. The main purpose of this custom node is to allow changes without reconnecting the LoraLoader node when the prompt is randomly altered, etc.

custom_nodes.author: Layer-norm
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui lama remover
custom_nodes.description: A very simple ComfyUI node to remove item with mask.

custom_nodes.author: LarryJane491
custom_nodes.title: Image-Captioning-in-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: The LoRA Caption custom nodes, just like their name suggests, allow you to caption images so they are ready for LoRA training.
